title: @COLLEGIATELOL @ULOL
body:
I'm trying to start a league team at Butler Community College in Eldorado Kansas. Can anyone help me understand what the collegiate teams do? Do they compete against each other in tournaments? Please help.
-EarthenDragon

replies.body:
Hey EarthenDragon,

There's the uLoL Campus Series, which is for competitive NA college teams, and the uLoL Clubs program, which is for social groups on campus.  Check out the uLoL page here for full details: http://ulol.leagueoflegends.com/index.html
